article_node.title: Stock Movers: Intel, Bullish, Tapestry
article_node.summary: Intel's shares surged following reports that the Trump administration is considering a government stake in the company to support its Ohio factory hub, which has faced delays. Meanwhile, Bullish's shares rose on its second trading day, focusing on crypto trading for institutional investors, although its products are not available to US users. Tapestry's shares fell significantly after it projected lower-than-expected earnings for 2026, despite a 69% increase in shares since April.
